titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: STOP SMOKING INTERVENTION SETTING TYPE REASON FOR EXCEPTION - Description

div.p: STOP SMOKING INTERVENTION SETTING TYPE REASON FOR EXCEPTION is the same as attribute PERSON OBSERVATION TEXT STRING.

For the Stop Smoking Services Quarterly Data Set this is a free text string to record an exception reason. This is used if the Stop Smoking success rate for the INTERVENTION SETTING TYPE FOR STOP SMOKING is 35% or below or 70% and above.
